text: وَقَالُوٓاْ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ ٱكۡتَتَبَهَا فَهِيَ تُمۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِ بُكۡرَةٗ وَأَصِيلٗا

translation.en: And they say, "Legends of the former peoples which he has written down, and they are dictated to him morning and afternoon
translation.id: Dan mereka berkata, "(Itu hanya) dongeng-dongeng orang-orang terdahulu, yang diminta agar dituliskan, lalu dibacakanlah dongeng itu kepadanya setiap pagi dan petang
